plot: Katja meets an illegal immigrant from Kosovo,who urgently needs her help.Touched by her doom, she starts a conversation. Ranging between trust and mistrust, she does not know whether to help or to leave her in misery.
title: Minusgrade
plot_es: Katja meets an illegal immigrant from Kosovo,who urgently needs her help.Touched by her doom, she starts a conversation. Ranging between trust and mistrust, she does not know whether to help or to leave her in misery.
plot_en: Katja meets an illegal immigrant from Kosovo,who urgently needs her help.Touched by her doom, she starts a conversation. Ranging between trust and mistrust, she does not know whether to help or to leave her in misery.
